composeFileTemplateContent:
version: '2'
services:
  ${container_name}:
    image: mbrekkevold/nav:latest
    ports:
      - ${port}:80
    volumes:
      - ${volume}/log:/usr/local/nav/var/log
      - ${volume}/roomimages:/usr/local/nav/var/uploads/images/rooms
    depends_on:
      - postgres
      - carbon-cache
      - graphite-web
    environment:
      - PGHOST=postgres
      - PGDATABASE=nav
      - PGUSER=nav
      - PGPORT=5432
      - CARBONHOST=carbon-cache
      - CARBONPORT=2003
      - GRAPHITEWEB=http://graphite-web/
      - NOINITDB=0
    networks:
      nmaas-ext-access:
      nmaas-dcn:
        ipv4_address: ${container_ip_address}
      nmaas-inter-container:

  postgres:
    image: postgres:9.4
    volumes:
      - ${volume}/postgres:/var/lib/postgresql/data
    networks:
      nmaas-inter-container:

  carbon-cache:
    image: mbrekkevold/nav-carbon-cache:latest
    volumes_from:
      - whisper
    networks:
      nmaas-inter-container:

  graphite-web:
    image: mbrekkevold/graphite-web
    environment:
      - TIME_ZONE=Europe/Oslo
      - CARBONLINK_HOSTS=carbon-cache:7002
    volumes_from:
      - whisper
    networks:
      nmaas-inter-container:

  whisper:
    image: busybox
    volumes:
      - ${volume}/whisper:/var/lib/graphite/storage/whisper
    networks:
      nmaas-inter-container:

networks:
  nmaas-ext-access:
    external:
      name: ${nmaas_ext_access_network}
  nmaas-dcn:
    external:
      name: ${nmaas_dcn_network}
  nmaas-inter-container:
